titleStmt.title: Sir Iohn Eliot his grave and learned speech spoken in the high court of Parliament desiring an orderlie proceeding in matters of religion and that it may not be onely disputed of but firmely established as it ought to be : expressing the misprision and errour whereby
Grave and learned speech spoken in the High Court of Parliament desiring an orderlie proceeding in matters of religion
titleStmt.author: Eliot, John, Sir, 1592-1632.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
